options.name: children
options.purpose: The content inside of the button

options.name: onClick
options.purpose: Function when button is clicked, a HTML button will be rendered if this prop is passed

options.name: to
options.purpose: React Router NavLink will be rendered if this prop is passed

options.name: size
options.purpose: Overall sizing of the component in terms of padding and fontSize

options.name: colorBackgroundDisabled
options.purpose: Background color of the button in disabled state

options.name: colorTextDisabled
options.purpose: Text color of the button in disabled state

options.name: isDarkButton
options.purpose: If set to 'true' a white spinner will be shown when loading

options.name: isLoading
options.purpose: Sets the button into a loading state and a spinner will be shown

options.name: isUppercase
options.purpose: Sets all text to be upppercase
